scope.1: Single location: only in one town, city, village, post code/zip
scope.2: Only in one Sub-region: only in oneﾠadministrative division, district, state, or province
scope.3: Multiple sub-regions: spread over multiple sub-regions, but not national in scope
scope.4: National: scaled to the national level ﾠ ﾠ ﾠ ﾠ ﾠ ﾠ
scope.5: Multiple countries: taking place in more than one country
scope.6: Regional: aimed at supporting regional capacity, regional institutions, regardless of where the activities are taking place
